dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: It looks like your new sneakers are good.

dialogues.name: ClassmateC
dialogues.content: Do you want to play together for a while?

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: But...I'm going to the library to studyâ€¦

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Forget it...just study later, let's go!

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: You guys go play, I'm going to the library to study first.
